title: Employee Manager
description: Management platform that allows you to save the employee's information into the database.

title: Pet Sitting Services
description: Full stack app that allows you to join as a customer or a sitter torequest or provide services for your or someone else's pet.

title: E-commerce App
description: Full stack fake e-commerce platform that sells candles.

title: Google Books API Search Engine
description: Application that fetches data from the Google Books API to display thebook cover and other details.

title: Online Dictionary
description: Application that fetches data from an API to display the word'sdefinition, part of speech, phonetics and examples in a sentence.

title: Java CLI Minesweeper
description: Minesweeper game built with Java. Playable in the command line.

title: Task Organizer
description: Application that creates and arranges a list of all the tasks to becompleted. Add, edit, delete or mark as completed, any of the items.
